Arthur Dent suspects that there is a difference in the variation in the number of daily customers at two restaurants, the Big Bang Burger Bar and Milliways. Both distributions are normal, and the populations are independent. Use α = 0.05. A sample of 40 randomly selected days from Big Bang Burger Bar found a standard deviation of 79.4781 customers. A sample of 21 randomly selected days from Milliways found a standard deviation of 40.4532. Test to see if there is a difference in the variance in the number of daily customers at the Big Bang Burger Bar compared to Milliways.
